features: Browse and search for medicines with detailed information
Order medicines and upload prescriptions for verification
Make secure payments for orders
Track the status of your orders in real-time
Admin can add and manage medicines with full control over the platform
heading: A fullstack online medicine ordering platform.

Place orders for cycle seamlessly
Secure online payments for hassle-free purchases
Track your cycle order status from dispatch to delivery

heading: A fullstack cycle store

Save desired properties for future reference
Role-based user management (user, owner, admin)
Registered owners gain access to special features
Admin has full authority for website management
heading: A fullstack real estate website.

features: Registration enables roles - Student, Teacher, and Admin.
Approved teachers customize classes, add content, and manage enrolled students.
Students log in, explore classes, and enrol in courses of interest.
heading: A fullstack learning website.

technologies: React.js, React Router, Node.js, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, Firebase, Axios
features: Donors can view requests for their surplus food donations.
Receivers can submit requests for specific food items from donors.
Dynamic platform updates to reflect the current status of available food items.
heading: A fullstack food surplus website.
